item.title: A Script Snippet to Go Through A Directory
item.description: In order to avoid repeat operations, I need to write a script to do the repeated word. Here is a snippet using in Matlab. This post is just as a backup. %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Code Name: % Coder: Author % date: 2019-10-09 %C-t % description: % Input module: % Output data: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% clear; clc; %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Setting the File Path %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% path='.../date_initial/'; dir_dat = dir(strcat(path,'*.dat')); % cd to save directory cd('.../date_final'); % number of files file_number = length(dir_dat); % name list of files with string type file_name_arr = string ( {dir_dat.
